org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api.cluster.impl.api.core

Interface Attribute

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttributeImpl

    public interface Attribute
    This class represent an Attribute as defined by the ZigBee Cluster Library specification
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        int getId()
        Returns:
        the 16-bit identifier of the attribute as specified by the cluster

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the String associated to this attribute as specified by the cluster

      • getType

        java.lang.Class getType()
        Returns:
        the java Class used to represent the attribute value

      • getZigBeeType

        ZigBeeType getZigBeeType()
        Returns:
        the ZigBeeType that describes the attribute type

      • isWritable

        boolean isWritable()
        Returns:
        the true if and only if the attribute can be written

      • isReportable

        boolean isReportable()
        Returns:
        the true if and only if the attribute support the Reporter

      • getValue

        java.lang.Object getValue()
                          throws ZigBeeClusterException
        Returns:
        the current value of the attribute
        Throws:
        ZigBeeClusterException

      • setValue

        void setValue(java.lang.Object o)
              throws ZigBeeClusterException
        If the attribute can be written (isWritable() this method set its value.
        Parameters:
        o - the value of to set the attribute to
        Throws:
        ZigBeeClusterException

      • getReporter

        Reporter getReporter()
        Returns:
        the Reporter
